document.full_text: after 9/11, president george w. bush famously urged americans to shop to bolster a shocked u.s. economy. now after osama bin laden's killing, consumers are snapping up memorabilia of his dramatic killing.
document.title: u.s. demand for bin laden memorabilia soars
lines_and_colors: after 9/11, president george w. bush famously urged americans to shop to bolster a shocked u.s. economy. now after osama bin laden's killing, consumers are snapping up memorabilia of his dramatic killing.
